name: Shadowshift Trial
learning_objectives: Introduce pressure plates that respond to size
Challenge player to combine all Shadow Arts

objectives.primary: Reach the exit using all four Shadow Arts
secondary: Activate pressure plates with correct sizes

tutorial_sequence.text: Excellent progress. You have learned translation, reflection, and rotation. Now: the final artâ€”Shadowshift.
Shadowshift is dilation: scaling yourself up or down. Click yourself and drag up to grow, down to shrink.
Let us practice. Grow yourself larger.
Size matters in the world. Some passages accept only small avatars. Others require large ones.
Pressure plates ahead respond to your size. Step on them when you match their requirement.
You have mastered all four Shadow Arts: translation, reflection, rotation, and dilation. Now combine them to escape.
